means: 多虑平，凯舒（一种抗抑郁药）

sentence.Network_en: Objective To study the antiallergic and anti - inflammatory effects of doxepin gel.
sentence.Network_cn: 目的研究多塞平凝胶的抗过敏 抗炎 作用.

sentence.Network_en: Conclusion Doxepin gel has antiallergic and anti - inflammatory effects.
sentence.Network_cn: 结论多塞平凝胶具有抗过敏 抗炎 作用.

sentence.Network_en: Objective : To evaluate the clinical efficacy of Doxepin combined with psychotherapy on the subgroups of IBS.
sentence.Network_cn: 目的: 评估多虑平结合心理疏导治疗不同类型肠易激综合征(IBS)患者的临床疗效.
